The compile tool acgmake

The tool acgmake provides an easy way to compile large projects consisting of several source code trees and using additional 3rd party libraries by just one acgmake command.

acgmake was developed at the Computer Graphics Group of the RWTH Aachen, for contact mail to habbecke@cs.rwth-aachen.de.
